project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would include: construction of about 100 new coffee washing stations, improvement to about 100 existing stations, construction of about 400 km of dry weather access roads, and technical services for the preparation of follow-up projects, for a survey of the coffee economy, and research into improved coffee grading and management practices.
